title: Give befitting reply to election foiling attempt through votes: PM
excerpt: Awami League (AL) President and Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina today said the countrymen will give a befitting reply with votes to the local and foreign conspiracies being hatched to bring a third party to power to disrupt the 7 January election.
